thread.section_title: Fast Cover Travel Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fast Cover Travel Insurance | fastcover.com.au
thread.title: Lindy
thread.title_full: Fast Cover Travel Insurance reviewed by Lindy

author: Lindy
title: Lindy
text: I was looking for overseas travel insurance for my mother who is 89 and for myself. Was pleasantly surprised that they would insure my mother as most insurance companies do not insurance people of this age. I also read reviews on them and the large majority was all positive. The process was quick and easy. I would have no hesitation in recommending Fast Cover Travel Insurance.
